guide.introduction:
How to Repair Nintendo DS Hinge/Shell

Remember that this not as easy a repair as it looks because it involves handling small screws and fragile stuff so you might not want to do it all yourself because you might mess things up. So you can get it repaired at Nintendo DS Lite Repair Shop.

Find cheap original Nintendo DS hinge replacements or replacement shells at Nintendo DS Lite Repair Shop, along with any other Nintendo DSL repair parts you may need.

Stay tuned for more NDS repair tutorials, and for any comments or any questions look at Nintendo DS repair. Thanks for watching.
